title: New Champ Select Idea
body: WIth this new champ select rito have attempted to prevent the classical old "mid or feed" tactic that people use. However i feel like i just wasted alot of time learning to play every role because of this new champ select and i feel like instead of putting down your best lanes, you should be able to put down the lanes you are the worst at instead. For example i like to play anything but support but now i can only choose mid or jungle. Just an idea i think many would find nice.

replies.body: It would be a nice feature, but I think valuing what my best roles are would still trump banning out my worst role. If you are really comfortable with every role, why not pick fill & mid?
